questions.question: What is a smart city like?

choices.text: A city with a lot of green trees to keep the air fresh
A city with many modern means of transportation
A city covered with Internet access everywhere
A city that utilizes modern technology and artificial intelligence to manage itself intelligently

questions.question: What is the following application used for?

choices.text: Buying items online from a supermarket
Monitoring the amount of water each household uses monthly
Used for online sales
Used to track the location of a person remotely

questions.question: What is the following application used for?

choices.text: Drivers use this app to find directions when transporting passengers
Online sellers use this app to find customers.
Used for road management
Used for traffic management

questions.question: Which of the following technologies are used in a smart city?

choices.text: Artificial intelligence and the Internet of Things (IoT)
Artificial meat processing technology
Soil-less agriculture technology
Water purification technology

questions.question: What benefits will digital transformation in education bring to learners?

choices.text: Help students achieve higher scores
Enable students to learn remotely without needing to go to school
Prevent students from feeling bored during learning
Make it easier for students to take exams

Companies use it to manage employees

Hospitals use it to manage pharmacies

choices.text: Placing online orders.
Ordering food online.
Online tutoring.
Hiring hourly domestic help.

choices.text: Graduates that look for job opportunities
Parents that seek tutors for their children
Supermarkets that want to find customers
Restaurants that look for employees

questions.question: What is the unique feature of the Thu Thiem Tunnel?

choices.text: It is the longest tunnel in Vietnam
It is the only tunnel in Vietnam that runs under a river (Saigon River)
It is the tunnel with the most lanes in Vietnam
It is the tunnel connecting districts within a city
